TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentResourceKey extends System.Windows.ResourceKey

summary.span: 基於外部組件 (Assembly) 中的類別 (Class) 名稱與其他識別項定義或參照資源索引鍵。

span.span: Defines or references resource keys based on class names in external assemblies, as well as an additional identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md). 這個類別會實作可用於建立組件加上識別項類型為基礎的索引鍵的物件類型。This class implements an object type that is useful for creating keys that are based on types in assemblies plus an identifier. 因為您定義或參考類型，您不需要要求特定，而且多個資源集可以存在於組件，每個不同的類型及其。Because you define or reference the type, you do not need to request a specific , and more than one set of resources can exist in the assembly, each differentiated by the type of their . 有兩種方式來定義。There are two ways to define a . 如果您想要更容易存取的索引鍵，您可以在控制項類別程式碼會傳回定義靜態屬性、 建構與外部資源的組件，存在於和。If you want an easily accessible key, you can define a static property on your control class code that returns a , constructed with a that exists in the external resource assembly, and a . 索引鍵用於組件中定義控制項的替代預設樣式，藉由交換自訂原始的外部資源組件。The key can be used for defining alternate default styles for controls in an assembly, by swapping the original external resource assembly for a custom one. 您也可以定義具名的資源部分在較大的控制項樣式或範本來公開自訂進入點。You can also define a named resource part within a larger control style or template to expose a customization entry point. 這是特別有用，如果您要為控制項定義的主題資源字典。This is particularly useful if you are defining a theme resource dictionary for your control. 您也可以使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)詳細語法來建立機碼的鬆散執行個體中。You can also use the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md) in verbose syntax directly to create a loose instance of the key. 這非常有用，如果您想要宣告私用的資源，以及自訂不易搜尋的其他組件。This is useful if you want to declare private resources from other assemblies that are less discoverable to customize.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式使用，因為值和值所需的正確初始化。The default constructor is not generally used, because a value and value are required for proper initialization. 預設建構函式存在主要是為了支援[ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)具名的參數形式的 XAML 用法。The default constructor exists primarily to support [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md) XAML usage in named parameter form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type typeInTargetAssembly, object resourceId) cil managed
Public Sub New (typeInTargetAssembly As Type, resourceId As Object)

param.name: typeInTargetAssembly
param.span: 可定義資源索引鍵的型別。

span.span: The type that defines the resource key.

param.name: resourceId
param.span: 唯一識別項，用來將這個 和與 typeInTargetAssembly 類型建立關聯的其他索引鍵相區別。

span.span: A unique identifier to differentiate this from others associated with the typeInTargetAssembly type.

summary.span: 指定用來定義索引鍵的 和做為額外資源識別項的物件，初始化 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a , specifying the that defines the key, and an object to use as an additional resource identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式存在兩個案例中，最重要的第一個案例：This constructor exist for two scenarios, with the first scenario being the most important: - 支援建立然後公開為自訂控制項類別上的公用靜態欄位。Supports creating a that is then exposed as a public static field on a custom control class. 這樣可簡化自己定義的資源，透過範本中的控制存取`{x:Static}`範本的屬性值的使用方式。This simplifies a control's access to its own defined resources in the template through `{x:Static}` usages for template property values. - 支援[ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)形式位置參數，也就是其中一種技術可供參考元件資源的協力廠商的 XAML 用法。Supports [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md) XAML usage in positional parameter form, which is one technique available for third parties that reference a component resource. ## Examples 下列範例會建立然後公開為靜態控制項類別提供樣式的自訂項目點的索引鍵。The following example creates a that is then exposed as a static key of a control class to provide a style customization entry point. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#CRKCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#crkcode)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#CRKCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#crkcode)]

summary.span: 取得或設定唯一識別項，以將這個索引鍵與這個型別的其他相關聯索引鍵相區別。

span.span: Gets or sets a unique identifier to differentiate this key from others associated with this type.
A unique identifier.
Typically this is a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md). 一般而言，用於字串值符合[XamlName 文法](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md)。Typically, the string used for a value conforms to the [XamlName Grammar](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xamlname-grammar.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來區分這個類型相關聯的其他人提供的這個索引鍵。The following example shows how to use the to differentiate this key from others associated with this type. [!code-xaml[ColorPicker_snip#SliderStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ColorPicker_snip/CSharp/ColorPickerLib/Themes/generic.xaml#sliderstyle)]

summary.span: 取得或設定可定義資源索引鍵的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that defines the resource key.

value.span: 可定義資源索引鍵的型別。

span.span: The type that defines the resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md). 項目可由自訂元件來定義從目標組件包含的型別為基礎的外部組件來存取資源的索引鍵。The element is used by custom components to define keys for resources that are accessed from external assemblies, based on targeting an assembly that contains the type. 自訂元件通常會定義新的類型必須是資源所在的組件中。Custom components often define new types which must be in the assembly where the resource is located. 通常這些型別沒有其他實作，類型只存在於以滿足的查閱需求。Generally these types have no other implementation, the types only exist in order to satisfy the lookup requirements of a . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義包括和使用[ComponentResourceKey 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md)。The following example shows how to define a including and using the [ComponentResourceKey Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/componentresourcekey-markup-extension.md). 這項資源可再放在外部組件和存取所要求資源使用類似的金鑰使用方式要求中。This resource can then be placed in an external assembly and accessed by a key usage that requests the resource using an analogous in the request. [!code-xaml[ColorPicker_snip#SliderStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ColorPicker_snip/CSharp/ColorPickerLib/Themes/generic.xaml#sliderstyle)]
